name: Tea Time (itch) (Dr.Bleep, Mr.Zayh, Slyzh)
description:
Help Tea Time get his cup of tea before it gets too cold! 

Move from platform to platform and watch out for obstacles on your way! 

____________________________________________________________________

How to play:

 Run "TeaTimeLameJam" after extracting the folder! 

Warning, No volume menu yet! Be careful with your level!  

____________________________________________________________________

Controls:

(Recommended for Controller)

Gamepad :

Move: Left Joystick

Dash: B

M&K:

Move: WASD

Dash : Right click

Made during "Lame Jam 27"

Dev team: 

Luc Werner, Aurélien Dechamps, Alex Mercier, Tea Time
